评论详情: I love this dress! It’s comfortable, and the Prussian blue color is beautiful. This color isn’t see-through, which is fine for me. For reference, I’m 6’ and 185 lbs, and I ordered a large—it fits perfectly, and the length is good. It’s good quality and I would definitely recommend this dress.
I wore this dress for my engagement photos and it was absolutely perfect. Well made, not see through, quality material, and so beautiful. Highly recommend.
Great quality and extremely flattering! Perfect for maternity
This is very pretty and comfortable. It’s great you don’t need to wear a bra. Has a lot of support!
I ended up giving this dress to someone else, it just didn’t fit me well. I could have used a smaller size.

This off-the-shoulder maxi dress is gorgeous and super comfortable! The smocked bodice fits perfectly, and the ruffle sleeves add a feminine touch. The lightweight fabric is ideal for summer, and the side slit makes it easy to move around. It’s flattering and works great for casual outings or special occasions. I’ve worn it to the beach and dinner dates, and it’s always a hit. Highly recommend for anyone looking for a stylish and breathable summer dress.
I wore this dress on a cruise and I love it!

I bought this dress for my baby shower and absolutely loved the way it fit. The fabric is thin but wearing it in the summer was perfect. I loved the way it looked on while I was pregnant and can’t wait to see it without the belly.

Because it’s so light weight and flowery, this worked perfect for my maternity photos on the beach, but will also fit perfectly even after pregnancy. The lavender is also exactly like it looks in the pictures in the posting, which was helpful for planning
Was really cheaply made wore it for engagement photos and it was sooo see through.

I ordered this when I was pregnant for my baby shower and I did look like a whale in it. But I kept it because I loved the blue and knew I would probably like it without a big belly haha! But wearing it not pregnant is so cute! It’s flowy and comfortable perfect during summer. Can really be dressed up or down depending on the shoes you wear, planning on wearing it to a wedding this summer!
Got for my engagement photos. Love it.
I was in between sizes that made me ultimately go with the bigger size. It fits perfectly (just gotta get rid of my pouch. But I love the material. You can't go wrong with a $50 wedding dress😁
Used this as a weddding guest dress and had so many compliments!!!! It’s super comfy, flowy and just felt great in it.

I LOVE this dress. not see through, great quality. I'm 5'3", 140lbs. I got a small. I like to wear this dress with heels, it ends up being just above the floor so it doesnt drag. It's the perfect length for me. The top part of the dress stays on nicely. :)
This is the 3rd thing in a row I have received that has clearly already been worn. Returning
Very comfortable and beautiful dress .. just like on the pictures!
I ordered this one as a back up option and ended up loving it more. It’s just so flattering! I’m 5’6 and it was just at ankles!
The fit of this dress was perfect. Loved the color and style. Good quality.

评论概述: Dress it up or down, you need this dress!
评论详情: This dress is absolutely stunning! The material is lightweight, yet not see-through, which is great. It has a nice amount of stretch, making it incredibly comfortable to wear. I love how versatile it is—I can easily dress it up with heels or keep it casual with sandals. It fits true to size, and I feel great every time I wear it. Highly recommend!
Beautiful dress, but not short friendly.
One of my favorite dresses! I wore it for my senior pictures and it was so comfortable and very flattering. Just as described and looked even better on then expecting.
Way too long for me. Straps were kinda itchy feeling under my arm. The top part looked and fit great on my chest. If it was shorter and not so see through I would have kept.

I’m honestly so disturbed by the dress I received… I was planning to use this for my baby shower and I got a dress with only one sleeve, covered in brown stains… I get it if y’all are using dresses and returning but come on how was this even allowed to be packaged and shipped to a customer for 50$!!!
Last minute engagement photoshoot. Purchased 4 dresses, this was my favorite. Quality was nice, light, and flowy. I’m 5’5’’ and the length was perfect.
Great dress. Great price. Light and breezy, comfortable and pretty. Top is stretchy great for those with larger busts.
Product didn't look like the picture, dress was completely see through, the sizing was larger than expected, wasn't comfortable, the material was falling apart.
Turned out great for family photos.

Either I got one that was stitched incorrectly, or the pictures are very misleading and people just went with it. The arm straps should not be stitched together at the same directly under the armpit. Like you can see in the picture from the advertisement. It’s super mega uncomfortable, does not give a gentle off the shoulder look. Instead, it looks like I’m squeezing into a dress that doesn’t fit me. This was supposed to be my engagement pictures this week. Now I have to scramble and find a new dress. I’m really upset I have to start over.

I was really hoping for a beige color for our Christmas photos but this gives more pink tones! It does wrinkle easily. The fit is accurate and quality sub par. I believe this is priced higher than the quality it is.
Esta ligero, lindo y coqueto. muy bien para el precio que es

Bought this for my baby shower! So glad I chose this one. I could have sized down but got a bigger size cause I wanted to be comfortable. Light and flowy material, didn’t find it see through and got so many compliments, will buy in more colors!
I'm 5' 8" and it was a little shorter on me than I would have hoped.

If you're going to a formal event, this dress in any color is a must. I ordered mine in my normal size (L) and the fit is perfect. I am only 5 ft 2, so typically I drown in dresses, however this one's length is perfect as well.
I loved the fit of this dress! Stretchy material on top and just comfortable and nice to wear.

评论概述: perfect for my family beach photos !
评论详情: i love this dress! it was perfect for my family beach photos! the top was see through for me but i just ordered a cheap white bandeau  & it did the job. it was comfortable  & the quality was really good , i ordered a small even though im usually a medium  & it fit me perfectly
Everyone’s different but this did not flatter me!! The fabric was as described, but the arm pieces just didn’t hit in a great spot. I returned.

Poorly made dress for what you spend. Don’t bother buying, the sleeves were two different sizes making the dress impossible to wear correctly. I bought this dress for family pictures and had to return before we even took them. Not flattering.
Really nice to wear to the beach lightweight sheer would be perfect to throw on after being at the beach looks amazing on it was accurate and very pretty.
It’s very pretty and I liked it a lot but the strapless elastic was tight against my chest and made an indent that wasn’t totally cute
This dress is so cute and versatile.
the dress was a bit see through but i still loved it! fit perfect! i got a size medium.

Purchased this dress in the light blue and the orange to bring on vacation and they’re AMAZING!! Such great flow and so flattering - I ended up wearing the blue one for family photos and the orange one to a luau and got so many compliments! I have recently put on a good bit of weight recovering after a major surgery, and I’m so self conscious about it. This dress made me feel confident and beautiful! For reference I’m currently 5’2 and about 140 lbs, a 38 B bra and I’m wearing a small. Def def def buy the dress! Oh and it washes beautifully too!

Absolutely LOVE this dress. It is so flattering, soft and comfortable. You can dress it up with heels or dress it down with flip flops and it’s even cute with cowboy boots!!! The color is absolutely gorgeous and I typically lean towards black dresses…so glad I was brave and got the bright color. Not see through in the important parts at all.

Wanted to love this for engagement photos. The dress has a white knee high skirt underneath that is very noticeable. The pics don’t make it obvious how noticeable it is. If it wasn’t for that then I would have liked it. Super see through, thin material
Bought for my courthouse wedding and it couldn’t have turned out better! Absolutely loved this dress and fit true to size! ❤️💍

I loved this dress for my maternity pictures! It fit perfectly and was so light and airy. I ordered my normal pre pregnancy size. The arm cuffs are kind of a pain but I only used it for pictures. I would probably have cut them off if I was going to wear it for a long period of time.
Color is better than expected, the fit is perfect, and it’s exactly what I was looking for.
A little see through in the top, but beautiful dress.

This was not it. I wanted a white dress for my engagement photos, but the fabric felt cheap, you could see the slip through the bottom, and where the chest hit made it look like I was wearing a pregnancy dress.  I have a similar body type to the model and it did not look like that at all. It might be a good option for a pregnancy photo shoot.

评论概述: GOOD PRICE, GOOD QUALITY. FAST SHIPPING

Wore this for maternity pics and it was so freaking perfect! Great dress 10/10!

评论详情: I love the fit, I love the look, I love the style, I love the material, I love the movement, I love the slit, I love the look, I love the versatility, I love love love everything about this beautiful dress!!
Hate how this shorter fabric is not all the way down underneath the dress. Makes it look so cheap. They didn’t show that in the pictures of the dress. Will have to return ):

I purchased the dress for beach pictures with my family. It was cool and comfortable and the color was GORGEOUS! The fit was amazing! There was a slip sewn in so it wasn't transparent below the waist. 10/10 will be buying this in different colors💯💯
Wore it too late to return but found out it is see through and I cannot wear it…
Ended up wearing for a maternity shoot. Great fit. Sized up bc of my belly but I’d say normally it would be true to size

There is absolutely nothing I would change about this dress. It was stunning! And the price tag was great too ! I despise flowy dresses but had an idea for a picture in front of our home. This dress helped us nail it!
Wanted a flowy dress for family pictures. This dress was perfect! Nice quality material, it fit well in all areas and was true to size. It is really light weight and flattering.

评论概述: I wish it was a little longer
评论详情: I am 5’6 and this dress was just a little too short. The busy area was also just a little too small so it didn’t look great on my waist.
Very poor material quality and very see through. Reminds me of a cheap Halloween costume.
Beautiful dress! Used it for my maternity photo shoot. Gave it a quick steam to iron out the wrinkles and it looked gorgeous!

I would give it 5 stars but , the straps on mine came needled together in the center ( different of showing in the picture) which made it a little tight around the arm, not giving the same fluid look. The quality of the fabric is good. I bought the pink one , it has some transparency but you can’t see through where it matters.I got lots of compliments on this dress. I am 33 weeks pregnant and bought a size large to wear for my baby shower, I usually wear a size medium and it fit perfectly.
My daughter wore this romantic breezy blue dress for photos with her best friend. Great fit! Great price! Fantastic color and easy to care for material.
This is so comfy & so classy, even wore it to a wedding. Has nice liner in top so not see through!
Great material good fit sized bigger
This was very see through. Just not flattering at all.
Beautiful dress....so many compliments!

评论概述: Good dress but not the color as described.

Beautiful on my granddaughter for beach pictures- just perfect in every way!
Was super cute for maternity pics! Good quality. Fit well. Very comfy.

评论概述: Fits perfect! Not see through at all.
评论详情: I love this dress! It fits me perfectly and is not see through. (At least not the orange) The orange is more of a coral-pink. It’s bright. For reference I am 5’9 and it’s plenty long to wear with a wedge.

This dress was perfect for my baby shower. 30 weeks and ordered my normal size, small. I wore pregnancy spanx under it which helped with the thin material. It was perfect and light weight for a June shower in Florida, esp since it was 98 degrees where we are. Perfect dress!

I got this to wear for a wedding and it was PERFECT! Great material, the shorter dress underneath is the perfect length, and it’s not sheer! My only thing is, I definitely needed to size down one as the top was falling down in the back!

I loved this dress! I got it specifically for my engagement photoshoot and it worked perfectly for what I was going for. I’m 5’0 and 115 lbs. Only thing- I wish they had an XS option available for the shorties hahah. Other than that the appearance was perfect, it was flowy in the right way, and it surprisingly wasn’t see through considering we got in the waterfall. I did not have to wear any boob tape or a sticky bra. The bottom of the dress is sheer which looked grog and the whole dress is very lightweight. Perfect summer dress!
It’s cute and comfortable. The material is soft but I don’t think it’s worth $50. It’s more of a $25-$30 dress at best.
This is definitely not the same as the pictures! Completely see through! Super thin and sheer. Bought it for my maternity shoot and there’s just absolutely no way! Very big fit!

I absolutely love this dress, I cut the sleeves off though, and I wear it with a light denim shirt that ties high up. Really cute. I ordered it in black, so I can’t speak about the lighter colors, but the black is not see-through.

I originally bought this dress for beach pictures. When I washed it for the first time, the sleeve fell off. I could have easily bought a better Quality dress for the price I paid for this one. $50+ for a one time use sucks

评论概述: Great dress but see-through up top
评论详情: I ordered this dress for my beach engagement photos and it worked perfectly for what I needed however, I did have to buy pasties because the top is absolutely transparent but overall it was the perfect fit and flow and fabric. I loved it.

The dress is exactly as pictured! The fit is true to size with stretch in the chest area! Love that there is a second lining underneath so it is not transparent in the skirt but recommend a bra as the top is a little sheer.  Personally the straps are not my style & a little tight in the arms, but not a dealbreaker! Overall a great dress for bridal events!

评论概述: The white is completely see through
评论详情: The top piece is completely see through The mid section has an extra layer of fabric that makes it less see through The fabric feels very cheap

Bought for my baby shower and I loved it. Im usually size L but I got a M and it fit perfectly fine. Made my belly look cute at 34 weeks. It wasn’t exaggerating long like most maternity dresses are, I wore flats and I could walk perfectly fine without tripping. Can’t complain at all, I was comfortable all day!
This dress is a very pretty. I did cut off the sleeves and it made me like it a little bit more. Perfect for cute pictures by the water!

Measurements are 5”3, 38 B, 33 W, 44 h. Got a large and it fits great with some stretch left. The fabric feels better than I was expecting and not as see through as I thought. Very soft and flowy. Will buy from this line again as long as their quality stays this good

What a great dress, I felt so beautiful in it. I am 140lbs 5’5 and a 32DD, olive complexion. I wanted something pretty and flowing to wear for a family photo shoot on the beach. I have absolutely no complaints. The cut allows the dress to cover belly area and it isn’t too low cut. It’s a show stopper. I got the pink, great color. Who ever designed this dress, I would like to shake their hand.
This casual ruffled dress is great for everyday wear and is versatile so you can dress it up with a cute low heel or a pair of wedges. Either way it's a cute addition to your wardrobe.
Used this for a Halloween costume and I was perfect, so comfy and it doesn’t look cheap.

Wouldn’t recommended this dress, at least not in white. It’s $50 for something that looks like I bought off SHEIN for $6. Fabric is super thin and see through, threads were coming undone. This is extremely overpriced for the quality or lack of quality of the item.
I ordered this for my daughter and she loves it. It fits great and looks amazing on her. She is very petit. Great value too.
Love this flowy coral colored dress! Flattering and comfortable, not see thru and love the partial side slit. Wish it came in many more colors!
I’m 5’4” B cup 130lbs and the small fit perfectly. The sleeves are adorable athe skirt underneath solves any see through issues. Surprisingly I can wear something black underneath and not see it
Returned. Very sheer material. Not what I was looking for.
This dress was absolutely perfect for my Baby in Bloom shower! Light weight and flowy yet flattering and comfortable!! Love that I’ll get to use this for more occasions even after the baby is born!

Worked perfect for our sunset lake pictures!
Love this dress. It is exactly as pictured. It’s very comfortable yet still elegant. True to size.
I love this dress for church or a day at the park.Super comfortable and lightweight.

The dress fit perfectly. For reference, I am 5'4" and 138 lbs and I ordered a small. The dress has a ruffled design. The material of the dress is soft and has a ribbed feel. Has a nice length, not too short. It is a dress for spring and summer.

评论概述: Happy Sailed Women's Summer V Neck Ruffle Short Sleeve Midi Dress
评论详情: This is a nice dress and well made. I like the way it fits, the material feels nice, and it fits me pretty true to size. I will be wearing a layering bralette underneath it for modesty purposes.
